body:
FMC seems to have an outward appearance of a good girl, but turns out to be kind of a slut. She gets confessed to, rejects it by tearing the love letter, but proceeds to have sex with him. Her next target is her teacher, who appears to be married without kids. After that, it shows her father who she seems to have a strained relationship with. FMC's teacher shows up to her house and informs her father about something, presumedly her being a having sex. The father confronts her and becomes her next target. They do the deed, teacher tries to join but FMC stops him, either because he already had his turn previously or because its her father that shes currently with. Her mother is coming back and might discover them.
Its clear to me that she has daddy issues, from which they story might have stemmed from. Shes either in love with the father, using sex to create a connection between them, or shes just a straight up slut. Her father and teacher seem to be the only ones cheating.

She's so hot even her own father couldn't resist fucking her.
If I were her teacher, then damn..I wouldn't be able to resist her either
Wow art is so good.... I'm desperately waiting for English translation
daughter is a fucking slut like giga slut
She way too cute when she give head
Ion need a translation to know that she deadass played with ma boi's heart, on god. I'd have to pack my shit and dip, on god. They can have all the fun they want
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me.
